isConsumed

public static boolean isConsumed(ByteReader theReader)
                          throws IOException
Check if the ByteReader is consumed, i.e., there is no more bytes to read at the current position

Parameters:
theReader - the reader to check
Returns:
whether or not the contents of the reader have been exhausted
Throws:
IOException - if there was an error checking the reader
